titles.title: To deauthorize a portion of the project for navigation, Milwaukee Harbor, Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
To deauthorize a portion of the project for navigation, Milwaukee Harbor, Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: This bill deauthorizes a portion of a specified project for navigation, Milwaukee Harbor, Milwaukee, Wisconsin, consisting of the navigation channel within the Menomonee River that extends from the 16th Street Bridge upstream to the upper limit of the authorized navigation channel.
